WITH first_select AS ( SELECT AD.NO, AD.MEMBER_NO, AD.CREATE_DATE, AD.TITLE, M.NAME MEMBER_NAME, AD.STATUS, A.APPROVAL_DATE, NULL AS POSITION_NO FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT AD JOIN MEMBER M ON AD.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN APPROVER A ON AD.NO = A.APPROVAL_DOCUMENT_NO WHERE AD.STATUS = 'F' OR AD.STATUS = 'A' OR AD.STATUS = 'O' ), second_select AS ( SELECT AD.NO, AD.MEMBER_NO, AD.CREATE_DATE, AD.TITLE, M.NAME MEMBER_NAME, AD.STATUS, NULL AS APPROVAL_DATE, P.NO POSITION_NO FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT AD JOIN MEMBER M ON AD.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.NO JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO WHERE P.NO = 1 OR AD.STATUS = 'F' OR AD.STATUS = 'A' OR AD.STATUS = 'O' )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM first_select UNION ALL SELECT * FROM second_select ) combined_results

SELECT * FROM first_select UNION ALL SELECT * FROM second_select ORDER BY 3 DESC
